QuestData.Title: On The Run
QuestData.Description:
<The guard captain appears to be fatally wounded.>
We were... transporting prisoners when de ambush came... a giant devilsaur... tore through everything.
Most of de prisoners escaped in de carnage... dese are hardened criminals. Dey cannot be allowed to roam free!
I swore a blood oath dat I would deliver dem to Vol'dun... I am probably going to die here, but I will not die an oathbreaker!
Find de escaped criminals and exile dem to Vol'dun.
